channel.title: Shops Problem
channel.description:
Whenever i follow ANY tut to making shops and then i try to enter the shop on mopar, it says "conneection lost, please wait-attempting to reestablish"
What is happening. all the other shops work fine. it's just the ones that i make.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 10:32:43 AM[/size][hr]please help 9 views no replies...sad :(

item.title: Shops Problem
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

make usre u added the wanneshop in client, to link the npc and the shop, and i think what you did wrong is when you add the npc to the autospawn list, you have to add shopkeepers with other shop keepers, if you put a shop keeper in with the mosnters in autospawn it will do that. so just move the code in autospawn so its imbetween 2 other shop keepers…
